import styles from './styling/header.module.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import { Context } from '../Context/AuthContext' import axios from 'axios' function Header(){ const {authenticated, userId} = useContext(Context) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/users/${userId}`) }, []) return(
